core_meaning: Square between Jupiter and Moon drives friction/work. Jupiter: growth, wisdom, mentor, law, faith, abundance. Moon: emotion, care, habits, home, public mood, mother. General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

facets.career: Mentorship, promotions, strategic expansion.  Public reception, brand sentiment, consistency. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.relationships: Goodwill, generosity, shared purpose.  Bonding, nurturance, emotional safety. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.money: Scaling revenue, windfalls, ethical growth.  Cyclic cashflow, consumer sentiment. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.health_adj: Liver, metabolic balance; avoid excess.  Hydration, sleep, digestion; stress sensitivity. Emphasis: friction/work.

risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: friction/work).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: friction/work).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: friction/work).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: friction/work).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: friction/work).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Jupiter: mentor, expand, publish; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: friction/work).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.

en.title: Jupiter Square Moon
en.core: Square between Jupiter and Moon drives friction/work. Jupiter: growth, wisdom, mentor, law, faith, abundance. Moon: emotion, care, habits, home, public mood, mother. General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

hi.title: Jupiter Square Moon (हिन्दी)
hi.core: Jupiter और Moon का Square — ऊर्जा friction/work के रूप में चलती है. थोड़ा संतुलन रखें; अवसर और सीख दोनों मिलेंगे.
